attributes.action: resign in shame for the abuse by him and a majority of MPs of parliamentary expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All of those currently in power or in positions to abuse and who have abused the current system (opposition MPs) should all resign for the shame they have bought on the house and on British democracy. Shame on them all.
We the British people have had enough of these self serving hypocrites.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
